sen.j: 御所田通（ごしょでんどおり）は京都市北区 (京都市)紫野東御所田町内を通る東西の道。
sen.e: Goshoden-dori Street is the east and west street which runs through Murasakino Higashi Goshodencho in Kita-Ward, Kyoto-City
Goshoden-dori Street is a street running east-west through Murasakino Higashi Goshodencho in Kita-Ward, Kyoto-City
Goshoden-dori Street is a street running east-west through Higashi Goshoden-cho Murasakino in Kita Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 油小路通東入から堀川通までのおよそ300m。
sen.e: This street is approximately 300m from Aburakoji-dori Higashi iru to Horikawa-dori.
The street is approximately 300m in length from Aburakoji-dori Higashi iru to Horikawa-dori.
The street is approximately 300m in length from Aburakoji-dori Street Higashi-iru to Horikawa-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Aburakoji-dori Street higashi-iru, Horikawa-dori Streetとしました。

sen.j: 並行して北から御所田上通（新町通から堀川通東入）、御所田北通、御所田北中通、御所田通、御所田南中通、御所田南通、御所田下通とおよそ50m間隔でならぶ。
sen.e: It is parallel from north, Goshodenkami-dori Street (from Shinmachi-dori Street to Horikawa-dori Street higashi iru), Goshodenkita-dori Street, Goshoden Kitanaka-dori Street, Goshoden-dori Street, Goshoden Minaminaka-dori Street, Goshodenminami-dori Street, Goshodenshimo-dori Street which lined with approximately 50m spaces each other.

Running parallel from the north is Goshodenkami-dori Street (from Shinmachi-dori Street to Horikawa-dori Street higashi iru), Goshodenkita-dori Street, Goshoden Kitanaka-dori Street, Goshoden-dori Street, Goshoden Minaminaka-dori Street, Goshodenminami-dori Street, and Goshodenshimo-dori Street which are spaced approximately 50 m from each other.

Running parallel from the north is Goshodenkami-dori Street (from Shinmachi-dori Street to Horikawa-dori Street Higashi-iru), Goshodenkita-dori Street, Goshoden Kitanaka-dori Street, Goshoden-dori Street, Goshoden Minaminaka-dori Street, Goshodenminami-dori Street, and Goshodenshimo-dori Street which are spaced approximately 50 m from each other.
sen.cmt: 他の表記と合わせ、Horikawa-dori Street Higashi-iruとしました。

sen.j: これらの通りは、1920年（大正9年）に京都市初の市営住宅として建設された「新町頭市営住宅」に伴い整備された。
sen.e: These streets are maintained with "Shinmachigashira City Housing which was established as the first city housing in Kyoto City in 1920.
These streets are maintained with "Shinmachigashira City Housing" which was the first city housing established in Kyoto City in 1920.
These streets are maintained with 'Shinmachigashira City Housing' which was the first city housing established in Kyoto City in 1920.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更

sen.j: 住宅地の中の交通量の少ない通りである。
sen.e: It is little traffic street in the residential area.
There is little traffic in the residential area.
There is little traffic in the residential area.
Main facilities on the street
Main facilities on the street
Main Facilities on the Street
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に修正

sen.j: 京都市北区 (京都市)役所
sen.e: Kyoto City Kita Ward Office
Kyoto City Kita Ward Office
Kyoto City Kita Ward Office

sen.j: 京都教育大学附属京都小学校 いずれも御所田上通新町通角
sen.e: Kyoto Elementary School attached to Kyoto University of Education: both, Goshodenkami-dori Street Shinmachi-dori Street kado
Kyoto Elementary School attached to Kyoto University of Education: both Goshodenkami-dori Street Shinmachi-dori Street kado
Kyoto Elementary School attached to Kyoto University of Education: both on the corner of Goshodenkami-dori Street and Shinmachi-dori Street

sen.j: いずれも御所田通に面していない。
sen.e: Both are not faced to Goshoden-dori Street.
Neither face Goshoden-dori Street.
Neither face Goshoden-dori Street.

sen.j: 島津製作所紫野工場 堀川通
sen.e: Shimazu Corporation Murasakino Factory: Horikawa-dori Street
Shimazu Corporation Murasakino Factory: Horikawa-dori Street
Shimazu Corporation Murasakino Factory: Horikawa-dori Street

sen.j: 伝紫式部墓 堀川通
sen.e: Murasaki Shikibu: Horikawa-dori Street
Murasaki Shikibu: Horikawa-dori Street
